arguments.hypothesis: The issue might be related to how the MinMaxCategoryRenderer objects handle equality comparisons based on their properties like 'drawLines', 'groupPaint', and 'groupStroke'. There could be a problem with the implementation of the equals method in MinMaxCategoryRenderer class.

modifications.modified_line: public boolean equals(Object obj) { if (this == obj) { return true; } if (!(obj instanceof MinMaxCategoryRenderer)) { return false; } MinMaxCategoryRenderer that = (MinMaxCategoryRenderer) obj; if (this.drawLines != that.drawLines) { return false; } if (!ObjectUtils.equal(this.groupPaint, that.groupPaint)) { return false; } if (!ObjectUtils.equal(this.groupStroke, that.groupStroke)) { return false; } return super.equals(obj); }
